title: Better Codeblocks
description: Enhances Discord's codeblocks with language indicators, copy buttons, and more.
author: TheCommieAxolotl

title: Better Typing
description: Enhance the typing indicator to be more useful. (Show Role Colors, Clickable Usernames)
author: TheCommieAxolotl

title: Pretty Links
description: Remove release channel information from message links.
author: TheCommieAxolotl

title: Preview Message
description: Allows you to preview a message before you send it.
author: TheCommieAxolotl

title: Unmask
description: Shows users with nicknames' usernames in chat.
author: TheCommieAxolotl
